channel.title: Removing decline trade
channel.description:
i simply want to have decline trade in the second trade window have no effect. i asume this is in clickingmost.java but idk where
im on a 317 delta

item.description:
@jailed wrote:

There is no playerTrade.java in delta

Read full topic

item.title: Removing decline trade
item.dc:creator: @Cooldude170 Cooldude170
item.description:
@Cooldude170 wrote:

Why…?
That wouldn’t be very balanced, but, for me it is PlayerTrade.java, I don’t know about you, but it should be something in ->players->items->Playertrade.java or something similar.
For me, just delete public void declineTrade(Player p){ if(p == null || !p.online){ return; } declinePlayer(p); Player plr = Engine.players[p.tradePlayer]; if(plr == null || !plr.online){ return; } declinePlayer(plr); }
But again, I have Bulby, but yours shouldn’t be too different.
One thing, I don’t believe it’s in the client.

Read full topic
